#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int t,n,temp,len;
	string s;
	char ch;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	int flag=0;
	t++;
	while(t--)
	{
		s="";
		while((ch=cin.get())!='\n')
		{
		  s=s+ch;
		}
		if(flag==0)
		{
		flag=1;
		continue;
		}
		len=s.length();
		
		for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
		{
		if(s[i]=='8'&&(i+1==len||s[i+1]==' ')&&(i==0||s[i-1]==' '))
		{
			cout<<"ate";continue;
		}
		if(i<len-1&&s[i]=='w'&&s[i+1]=='8'&&(i+2==len||s[i+2]==' ')&&(i==0||s[i-1]==' '))
		{
			cout<<"wait";i=i+1;continue;
		}
		if(i<len-2&&s[i]=='g'&&s[i+1]=='r'&&s[i+2]=='8'&&(i+3==len||s[i+3]==' ')&&(i==0||s[i-1]==' '))
		{
			cout<<"great";i=i+2;continue;
		}

		if(s[i]=='4'&&(i+1==len||s[i+1]==' ')&&(i==0||s[i-1]==' '))
		{
			cout<<"for";continue;
		}
		if(i<len-1&&s[i]=='b'&&s[i+1]=='4'&&(i+2==len||s[i+2]==' ')&&(i==0||s[i-1]==' '))
		{
			cout<<"before";i=i+1;continue;
		}
		cout<<s[i];	
		}
	cout<<"\n";	
	}
}
